info.title: TON API
info.description: API for interacting with The Open Network (TON) blockchain

get.description: Retrieves a list of Jetton master contracts from the TON blockchain

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of Jetton masters to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of Jetton masters to skip before starting to return results

address.description: The address of the Jetton master contract

decimals.description: The number of decimal places for the Jetton

totalSupply.description: The total supply of the Jetton

mintable.description: Whether new tokens can be minted

admin.description: The address of the Jetton admin

contentUri.description: The URI of the Jetton's content
